item.title: Comment on Great Eyebrows of our Time by Boat Survey: Teluk Air Tawar – Kuala Muda IBA, mainland Penang, 16 Feb 2013 | Dig deep
item.dc:creator: Boat Survey: Teluk Air Tawar – Kuala Muda IBA, mainland Penang, 16 Feb 2013 | Dig deep
item.description: [...] and the bird two to the right of the curlew with bill and half the head submerged). Those “Denis Healey eyebrows” are a dead giveaway, as is the skinny side-on profile compared to the much larger and [...]

item.title: Comment on Swine Fever! – Pork Scratchings by Pork Scratchings
item.dc:creator: Pork Scratchings
item.description: I have never eaten pork scratchings. Please let me know one thing, i wanted to know that how to generate swine fever?
item.content:encoded: I have never eaten pork scratchings. Please let me know one thing, i wanted to know that how to generate swine fever?

item.title: Comment on Quis custodiet (ipsos custodes)2? Oh, it’s me. Right. by Gervais

item.description: Surely spreading the fear of such a possible attack, is terrorism in itself?
item.content:encoded: Surely spreading the fear of such a possible attack, is terrorism in itself?

item.title: Comment on Walk like an echinosaur by myles f osborne
item.dc:creator: myles f osborne
item.description:
I'll try again:
The punchline is this: . . . O . . . [pronounced 'elipsis oh elipsis]- could Morse have supplied the clue?
Please supply lead-up(s) to this hilarious joke.
I shall be in your debt forever. MFO
item.content:encoded:
I’ll try again:

The punchline is this: . . . O . . . [pronounced ‘elipsis oh elipsis]- could Morse have supplied the clue?

Please supply lead-up(s) to this hilarious joke.

I shall be in your debt forever. MFO

item.title: Comment on Election Strategies #248 by Dead Badger
item.dc:creator: Dead Badger
item.description:
Hi Simon,
Mine is a resized version of <a href="http://images.wikia.com/uncyclopedia/images/thumb/4/42/Gir.gif/320px-Gir.gif" rel="nofollow">this one here</a>. I think that's where I got it, anyway...
item.content:encoded:
Hi Simon,

Mine is a resized version of this one here. I think that’s where I got it, anyway…

item.title: Comment on Election Strategies #248 by Simon124
item.dc:creator: Simon124
item.description:
Hi,
Where did you get your Gil? (Your icon on the Guardian website)?
I have one too but he dances!
It's strange how I came by him, but I think he was made by someone in Austin, Texas for a Sci-Fi Film festival, it would be interesting to know where you found yours!
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

Where did you get your Gil? (Your icon on the Guardian website)?

I have one too but he dances!

It’s strange how I came by him, but I think he was made by someone in Austin, Texas for a Sci-Fi Film festival, it would be interesting to know where you found yours!
